SEARCH
Package com.project.saintcyshospital.ws

Class WsHub

java.lang.Object
com.project.saintcyshospital.ws.WsHub
public class WsHub extends Object
App-wide notification websocket hub.

Maintains a single process-wide connection to /notif, posts system notifications for server-pushed events, and broadcasts raw text payloads via ACTION_WS_MESSAGE intents.

Use start(Context) in each visible activity (we ref-count) and stop() in onStop().

Author:
Trice Buchanan

    private android.content.Context
    appCtx
    Application context captured on first start(Context) call and used for toasts, notifications, and broadcasts to avoid leaking activity references.
    private static final String
    CHANNEL_ID_DEBUG
    Notification channel id used for websocket-driven notifications.
    private final WebSocketClient
    client
    Underlying websocket client responsible for connecting to the notifications endpoint and dispatching events to the listener.
    static final String
    EXTRA_TEXT
    Intent extra key containing the text body of the notification.
    private static final String
    GROUP_KEY_NOTIFS
    Group key used to group individual notification messages into a single summary notification in the status shade.
    private static final WsHub
    INSTANCE
    Singleton instance of the websocket hub used throughout the app.
    private static int
    nextNotifyId
    Monotonically increasing id used to assign unique ids to each posted notification so they do not overwrite each other.
    private android.app.NotificationManager
    nm
    System NotificationManager used to post notifications for incoming websocket messages.
    private int
    refCount
    Count of active callers that have invoked start(Context) and not yet matched it with stop().
    private static final int
    SUMMARY_ID
    Fixed notification id for the summary notification that represents the grouped set of websocket notifications.
    private static final String
    WS_URL
    Websocket endpoint used for receiving live notification messages.

      System NotificationManager used to post notifications for incoming websocket messages.

    • refCount

      private int refCount
      Count of active callers that have invoked start(Context) and not yet matched it with stop(). When this reaches zero the websocket connection is disabled and closed.

    • WS_URL

      private static final String WS_URL
      Websocket endpoint used for receiving live notification messages.

    • WsHub

      public WsHub()

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static WsHub get()
      Returns the shared WsHub instance.
      Returns:
      the process-wide websocket hub

    • start

      public void start(android.content.Context ctx)
      Increments the visible-screen ref count and ensures the websocket is connected. Also creates the notification channel (id "notif_ws_debug") once.
      Parameters:
      ctx - any context; the hub holds an application context internally

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Decrements the visible-screen ref count. When it reaches zero, the hub disables and disconnects the websocket to avoid unnecessary reconnect loops.

    • connect

      private void connect()
      Internal connect routine that builds the client listener and handles onOpen/onMessage/onClosed/onFailure. Posts grouped notifications and emits a broadcast (ACTION_WS_MESSAGE) for screens that want the raw text.
